title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8103.01 - City of Binghamton
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8103.01 - City of Binghamton

State Regulations
(a) US
Route 11. The northbound and southbound roadways of US Route 11, between the
easterly Binghamton city limit and Alice Street, a distance of 1.9+-
miles. (b) [Repealed]
(c) Route 363. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 363 including all ramps between Route 434 and Route 7, a
distance of 1.50+- miles in the City of Binghamton. (d) [Eff. until July 11, 2001, see also subd. (d) below.] Route 7. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 7, including
all ramps between Route 363 and I-81, a distance of 0.40+- mile in the City of

Binghamton. (d) [Eff. July 11, 2001, see also subd. (d) above.] Route 7. Route 7, including all ramps, between

Robinson Street and I-81. (e) Alice

Street between US Route 11 and Robinson Street, a distance of 0.20+- mile, provided, however, that Alice Street between US Route 11 and Robinson Street is
designated as an access highway for use by tandem trailer combinations of not
more than 96 inches in width only, and is not hereby designated as an access
highway for any other types of vehicles. (f) Frederick Street. Frederick Street
between Route 7 and Montgomery Street. (g) Whitney Avenue. Whitney Avenue between

Frederick Street and Robinson Street. (h) US Route 11 between the northerly

Binghamton city line and Karlada Drive, a distance of 0.3+- mile in the City of

Binghamton. (i) Karlada Drive
between US 11 and a point 300 feet west of US 11, a distance of 0.05+- mile; provided, however, that Karlada Drive between US 11 and a point 300 feet west
of US 11 is designated as an access highway for use by tandem trailer
combinations and is not hereby designated as an access highway for any other
types of vehicles. (j) Robinson

Street. Robinson Street between Route 7 and Whitney Avenue. (k) Montgomery Street. Montgomery Street
between Frederick Street and a point 2,500 feet north of Frederick

Street. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8103.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
